General.Name: Interconnection Electric SA ESP
General.Description: Interconexión Eléctrica S.A. E.S.P. engages in the electric power, roads, ICT, and telecommunications business unit activities. The company expands, operates, and maintains 47.358 km of high-voltage transmission network and 92.720 MVA of transmission infrastructure in Colombia, Peru, Bolivia, Brazil, and Chile, as well as the international interconnections that operate between Colombia-Ecuador and Ecuador-Peru. It also designs, builds, operates, and maintains road infrastructure; and provides telecommunication and digital solutions; and manages approximately 54.034 km of fiber optics network. Interconexión Eléctrica S.A. E.S.P. was incorporated in 1967 and is based in Medellín, Colombia.
